sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T0.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (
SELECT b.ORGNZT_NM, a.ESNTL_ID, a.USER_NM, a.EMPL_NO, a.OFCPS_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO b ON a.ORGNZT_ID = b.ORGNZT_ID WHERE 1=1
NVL(b.ORGNZT_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
NVL(a.USER_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
ORDER BY b.ORGNZT_NM, a.USER_NM ASC
) T0 ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(EMPLYR_ID) as cnt FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO b ON a.ORGNZT_ID = b.ORGNZT_ID WHERE 1=1
NVL(b.ORGNZT_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
NVL(a.USER_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'

SELECT A.INFRML_SANCTN_ID, A.JOB_SE_CODE, B.CODE_NM JOB_SE_NM, A.APPLCNT_ID, C.USER_NM APPLCNT_NM, A.REQST_DE, A.SANCTNER_ID, D.USER_NM SANCTNER_NM, E.ORGNZT_NM SANCTNER_ORGNZT_NM, A.CONFM_AT, A.SANCTN_DT, A.RETURN_RESN FROM COMTNINFRMLSANCTN A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID = 'COM075' AND A.JOB_SE_CODE = B.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO C ON A.APPLCNT_ID = C.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO D ON A.SANCTNER_ID = D.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO E ON D.ORGNZT_ID = E.ORGNZT_ID WHERE A.INFRML_SANCTN_ID = #infrmlSanctnId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNINFRMLSANCTN (INFRML_SANCTN_ID, JOB_SE_CODE, APPLCNT_ID, REQST_DE, SANCTNER_ID, CONFM_AT, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( #infrmlSanctnId#, #jobSeCode#, #applcntId#, #reqstDe#, #sanctnerId#, #confmAt#, sysdate, #frstRegisterId#, sysdate, #lastUpdusrId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNINFRMLSANCTN SET SANCTNER_ID = #sanctnerId#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE INFRML_SANCTN_ID = #infrmlSanctnId#

UPDATE COMTNINFRMLSANCTN SET CONFM_AT = #confmAt#, SANCTN_DT = sysdate, RETURN_RESN = #returnResn#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE INFRML_SANCTN_ID = #infrmlSanctnId#
